name: Bubble Quest
description:
Game I made for the Weekly Game Jam but couldn't submit because I didn't finish in time... But, it's here. Hope you enjoy and let me know if you made it through the end!

Use your mouse/touch to drag the ball along the pipe and reach the end to the next level.

There are 4 levels in the game at the moment. Hope you enjoy!

Credits:
